name: Ice Bucket Challenge DAO
description:
Lou Gehrig’s Disease, also known as ALS, is a neuro-degenerative disease that affects nerve cells in the brain and spinal cord, eventually leading to paralysis and death. There is no effective treatment. My mother is one of the patients.
The Ice Bucket Challenge is a fundraiser launched on social networks  in 2014, intended to draw attention to people with ALS.But now, there is still o effective treatment. There are at least millions new patients in World every year.
There are many scientists in the world who are promoting new drug research 
,but lack of funds.Ice Bucket Challenge DAO aims to raise funds to help develop new drugs.
payDisclosure: To Cure Sometimes, To Relieve Often, To Comfort Always
